title: A Case of depression
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health education
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Suicide
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness - Treatment
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Depression, Mental
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Patient care
description: Episode of Series "Horizon". Looks at the problems of diagnosing depression and treating it. Follows the experience of a suicidal patient through shock therapy and questions the effectiveness of this crude technique. Shows a leucotomy operation which cures a woman of a 9-year depression, but asks how much can be done for the ordinary depressed patient. Narrated by Paul Vaughan.
